mapper.update: update WM_DICTIONARYSCHILD set CREATORID = #{creatorid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATERID = #{updaterid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATER = #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATETIME = #{updatetime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CODE = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DCODE = #{dcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FLAG = #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NOTE = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DICTIONARYS_ID = #{dictionarysId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, CREATORID, CREATOR, CREATETIME, UPDATERID, UPDATER, UPDATETIME, CODE, DCODE, FLAG, NAME, NOTE, DICTIONARYS_ID from WM_DICTIONARYSCHILD where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select ID, CREATORID, CREATOR, CREATETIME, UPDATERID, UPDATER, UPDATETIME, CODE, DCODE, FLAG, NAME, NOTE, DICTIONARYS_ID from WM_DICTIONARYSCHILD order by updateTime desc,updater asc
